hero.title: Manchester City
hero.description: A global football powerhouse with unmatched excellence, innovation, and a commitment to beautiful football. Home to world-class talent and a legacy of triumph.

stadium.subtitle: Our Home
stadium.title: Etihad Stadium
stadium.description: An architectural masterpiece and our fortress since 2003. The Etihad Stadium represents the pinnacle of modern football venue design, offering an unparalleled matchday experience for over 53,000 passionate supporters.

excellence.subtitle: Excellence in Numbers
excellence.title: Defining
excellence.description: Our achievements speak volumes about our commitment to excellence and our position among the world's elite football clubs.

honors.subtitle: Trophy Cabinet
honors.title: Champions
honors.description: A distinguished collection of trophies that represents decades of dedication, skill, and unwavering pursuit of excellence.

stadium.subtitle: Our Home
stadium.title: Etihad Stadium
stadium.description: An architectural masterpiece and our fortress since 2003. The Etihad Stadium represents the pinnacle of modern football venue design, offering an unparalleled matchday experience for over 53,000 passionate supporters.

cta.title: Join the
cta.description: Become part of a global community that shares the passion for beautiful football, excellence, and the Manchester City legacy. Experience the pride, the victories, and the unforgettable moments together.

hero.title: Club History
hero.subtitle: Over 140 years of legacy, triumph, and unwavering passion

timeline.title: Historical
timeline.description: Key moments that shaped our incredible journey

foundation.title: Club Foundation
foundation.description: Founded as St. Mark's (West Gorton) by Anna Connell and church wardens.

nameChange.title: Becomes Manchester City
nameChange.description: The club changes its name to Manchester City Football Club.

firstTitle.title: First League Title
firstTitle.description: Won the First Division title for the first time in club history.

stadiumMove.title: Move to Etihad Stadium
stadiumMove.description: Relocated to the City of Manchester Stadium (now Etihad Stadium).

ownership.title: New Ownership
ownership.description: Taken over by Abu Dhabi United Group, marking a new era for the club.

dramaticWin.title: Dramatic Premier League Win
dramaticWin.description: Won the Premier League in dramatic fashion with Aguero's last-minute goal.

treble.title: Treble Winners
treble.description: Won Premier League, FA Cup, and Champions League in a historic season.
